Name: Pisco Punch (Lannes' recipe)
Ingredients: 75 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with soda.
Review: Pisco's character shines through the sweetened pineapple fruit in this long, refreshing classic.
History: This recipe is adapted from John Lannes' recipe, owner of the famous Bank Exchange when it closed in 1920. Our Pisco Punch cocktail page gives a more detailed history of this drink and explains the different recipes.
Nutrition: One serving of Pisco Punch (Lannes' recipe) contains 184 calories
